headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for devices using the Tuya Web API.
footerDisplay: If you have any suggestions, please open an issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/milo526/homebridge-tuya-web/issues).

name.title: Name
name.description: You shouldn't need to change this.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username for your account that is registered in the Android/iOS app.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for your account that is registered in the Android/iOS app.

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: Your account country code, e.g. 1 for USA, 86 for China, 44 for UK.

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: The app where your account is registered. 'tuya' for Tuya Smart, 'smart_life' for Smart Life, 'jinvoo_smart' for Jinvoo Smart.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Inverval
pollingInterval.description: The frequency in seconds that the plugin polls the cloud to get device updates. Can be left empty to only fetch on request.
